attributes.action: Ban the use of the words 'jade goody' in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: people are getting sick and tired of these words, ban them, don't give her a state funeral and don't make her patron saint of England, what ever next.  We the people are sick of these talentless sponging celebs

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
